title: MroMax 4PCS Lift Off Hinge 4.92" x 1.38" x 0.07" Stainless Steel Slip Joint Flag Hinges for Window Cupboard Cabinet Door Silver Tone

【Premium & Durable Material】 Made of high-quality stainless steel, it has strong corrosion resistance and rust resistance, high temperature resistance and oxidation resistance; strong and durable, easy to use.
